name: Cave of Hope
description:
Cave of Hope

Cave of Hope is a small text adventure game that was primarily created to learn Unity game engine. 

General Story Setting

Embark on a short and quick journey to find a miracle cure for your sick mother. On your way you might have to make some decisions that will pave way to success or an eminent end. 

End Comments

Please share your feedback. Since it's my first time on this platform to pardon my mistakes and I look forward to some constructive criticism. If you do enjoy this game, let me know in the comments section below. 

Cheers!

Happy Gaming!
